Detailed Description

Implements the Future Event List (FEL) for event-oriented simulation

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

EventQueue::EventQueue (  ) 

Creates an empty event queue

Member Function Documentation

void EventQueue::clear (  ) 

Clears all events from the queue

uint64_t EventQueue::getEventsProcessed (  ) 

Returns the number of events processed

void EventQueue::insert ( Event *  e  ) 

Inserts an event into the queue at the appropriate time EventQueue is responsible for deleting the event

Tick EventQueue::Now (  ) 

Returns the current tick in simulated time

bool EventQueue::processNext (  ) 

Calls process() on the first event in the queue, then deletes the event

Returns:
true if an event was processed, or false if there are no events left in the queue
